1.name: 1. Cult of the Cobra
1.description: American G.I.s who trespass on a Hindu ceremony are hunted down by a beautiful woman who has the power to transform herself into a cobra.

2.name: 2. Gunsmoke
2.description: Marshal Matt Dillon keeps the peace in rough-and-tumble Dodge City.

3.name: 3. Oklahoma
3.description: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

4.name: 4. Alfred Hitchcock Presents
4.description: Stories of terror, horror and suspense presented by Alfred Hitchcock.

5.name: 5. East of Eden
5.description: Two brothers in 1910s California struggle to maintain their strict, Bible-toting father's favor as an old secret about their long-absent mother comes to light.

6.name: 6. The Night of the Hunter
6.description: A self-proclaimed preacher marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real dad hid the $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.

7.name: 7. To Catch a Thief
7.description: A retired jewel thief sets out to prove his innocence after being suspected of returning to his former occupation.

8.name: 8. Lady and the Tramp
8.description: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

9.name: 9. Picnic
9.description: Emotions are ignited among the complacent townsfolk when a handsome drifter arrives in a small Kansas community on the morning of the Labor Day picnic.

10.name: 10. Rebel Without a Cause
10.description: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.

11.name: 11. Highway Patrol
11.description: Powerful patrol cars, fast motorcycles, and superheterodyne two-way radios combine to fight crime on the rural highways of America's wide open spaces.

12.name: 12. The Big Knife
12.description: Hollywood actor Charles Castle is pressured by his studio boss into a criminal cover-up to protect his valuable career.

13.name: 13. Cheyenne
13.description: After the Civil War, nomadic adventurer Cheyenne Bodie roamed the West looking for fights, bad guys to beat up, and women. His job changed from episode to episode.

14.name: 14. Dixon of Dock Green
14.description: Constable George Dixon and his colleagues at the Dock Green police station in the East End of London deal with petty crime, successfully controlling it through common sense and human understanding.

15.name: 15. The Seven Year Itch
15.description: When his family goes away for the summer, a hitherto faithful husband with an overactive imagination is tempted by a beautiful neighbor.

16.name: 16. The Little Rascals
16.description: Television syndication package of the classic 1929-1938 shorts from the "Our Gang Comedies" movie series.

17.name: 17. Guys and Dolls
17.description: In New York, a gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana, but they fall for each other, and the bet has a hidden motive to finance a crap game.

18.name: 18. This Island Earth
18.description: Aliens come to Earth seeking scientists to help them in their war.

19.name: 19. Les diaboliques
19.description: The wife and mistress of a loathed school principal plans to murder him with what they believe is the perfect alibi.

20.name: 20. Marty
20.description: A middle-aged butcher and a school teacher who have given up on the idea of love meet at a dance and fall for each other.

21.name: 21. The Honeymooners
21.description: A bus driver and his sewer worker friend struggle to strike it rich while their wives look on with weary patience.

22.name: 22. The Ladykillers
22.description: Five oddball criminals planning a bank robbery rent rooms on a cul-de-sac from an octogenarian widow under the pretext that they are classical musicians.

23.name: 23. Summertime
23.description: An American spinster's dream of romance finally becomes a bittersweet reality when she meets a handsome--but married--Italian man while vacationing in Venice.

24.name: 24. Kiss Me Deadly
24.description: A doomed female hitchhiker pulls Mike Hammer into a deadly whirlpool of intrigue, revolving around a mysterious "great whatsit".

25.name: 25. Pather Panchali
25.description: Impoverished priest Harihar Ray, dreaming of a better life for himself and his family, leaves his rural Bengal village in search of work.
